data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe the last story you heard that made you laugh. What made the story funny? Who did you share the story with, and how did they respond?
data.answer: The last story that made me laugh was from a Korean TV series, named Hometown Cha-Cha-Cha. In the series, the main actor told the main actress a very funny joke and it made me chuckle a lot. After I heard this joke, I called my friend and shared the story with her. After she heard the joke, she started to laugh none-stop as well. So, both my friend and I really enjoyed this joke.
